entry.title: Tuesday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 21.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Periods of light snow beginning before morning. Wind northwest 30 km/h becoming light early this evening. Low minus 21. Wind chill minus 19 this evening and minus 25 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Tuesday 07 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Periods of light snow. High minus 5.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending late in the morning then a mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 5. Wind chill minus 20 in the morning and minus 7 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Tuesday 07 February 2023
